title: Wall Street falls as trade optimism fizzles
text:
Wall Street falls as trade optimism fizzles

Stock Markets 3 hours ago (Sep 20, 2019 04:06PM ET)

© Reuters. Traders work on the floor at the NYSE in New York (Reuters) - Wall Street dropped on Friday after a Chinese agriculture delegation canceled a planned visit to Montana next week, dampening optimism about U.S.-China trade talks. The Dow Jones Industrial Average ( ) fell 160.19 points, or 0.59%, to 26,934.6, the S&P 500 ( ) lost 15.08 points, or 0.50%, to 2,991.71 and the Nasdaq Composite ( ) dropped 65.21 points, or 0.8%, to 8,117.67.

Wall Street falls as trade optimism fizzles
description: Wall Street falls as trade optimism fizzles
